analysis.description:
ERC721 (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#498-518) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#504-505)
	-transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#505-506)
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#506-508)

AetherOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#529-715) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#617-628)
	-transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#641-657)
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#593-605)

AetherClockAuction.bid (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1261-1275) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- seller == address(nonFungibleContract)

Reentrancy in ClockAuction.ClockAuction (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1066-1073):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(candidateContract.implementsERC721()) (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1069-1071)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- nonFungibleContract (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1071-1072)

Reentrancy in AetherClockAuction.bid (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1261-1275):
	External calls:
	- _transfer(msg.sender,_tokenId) (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1266-1268)
	External calls sending eth:
	- price = _bid(_tokenId,msg.value) (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1265-1266)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastSalePrices (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1271-1272)
	- saleCount (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1275)

Reentrancy in ClockAuction.createAuction (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1105-1124):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_owns(msg.sender,_tokenId)) (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1116)
	- _escrow(msg.sender,_tokenId) (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1116-1117)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenIdToAuction (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1124)

Reentrancy in AetherClockAuction.createAuction (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1237-1259):
	External calls:
	- _escrow(_seller,_tokenId) (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1253-1254)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenIdToAuction (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1258-1259)

Reentrancy in AetherAuction.setSaleAuctionAddress (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1302-1315):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(candidateContract.isAetherClockAuction()) (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1305-1306)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- saleAuction (/unique_contracts/0x31d4c5be1082a88f2abafea549b6c189c2cf057f.sol#1310-1312)
